data.aicreationcommand: Generate up to 7 semantic topics based on the following metadata:
data.aicreationdescription: A list of topics that describe the underlying concepts, emotions, actions, and themes. Focuses on the essence of what is happening — abstract ideas, moods, and relationships — NOT generic object names unless they are essential to the concept. Used for topic clustering, topic search, topic filtering, and topic recommendations.

data.notes: (NER: Named Entity Recognition) is most useful when you need to extract concrete facts (companies, people, locations, products) for building indexes, knowledge graphs, or searchable databases
data.aicreationcommand: Extract a list of named entities from the following metadata:
data.aicreationdescription: A list of named entities that describe the content. Named entities are specific names of people, organizations, locations, products, and other proper nouns.

data.notes: (NER: Named Entity Recognition) is most useful when you need to extract concrete facts (companies, people, locations, products) for building indexes, knowledge graphs, or searchable databases
